scenes.narration: In the last 2 hours, 15 events unfolded in the Chained repository, orchestrated by 3 collaborators working in harmony.

characters.name: Build Guardian
characters.line: I've tracked 10 pull requests. Let's see what stories they tell.

scenes.narration: 3 pull requests merged into main. The codebase evolves.

characters.name: Merge Oracle
characters.line: The merge is complete. Well done, Copilot.

scenes.narration: 7 pull requests are open, awaiting the judgment of reviewers.

characters.name: Copilot
characters.line: I hope the reviewers like my changes...

characters.name: Code Reviewer
characters.line: Let me examine this carefully. Quality matters.

scenes.narration: 3 issues closed. The bug hunters have been busy.
